conbody.p: Domestic duck owners must learn to document valuable information about their ducks using a database.
Every duck owner should keep track of her ducks' growth. You can create an entry for each duck. Each entry contains a chart where you can type in the duck's height, weight, and wingspan week by week.
To add an entry for a duck to your database, type add entry followed by the name of the duck in parentheses into the command line and press Enter.
